welcome.title: Welcome to the Guided Compliance Journey
welcome.description: This AI-powered agent will guide you through analyzing a policy, identifying compliance gaps against the HRSD framework, and creating an actionable plan to resolve them. The process involves selecting a policy, letting the AI perform its analysis, and then reviewing the generated compliance plan.

steps.1: Hello! I'm your AI Guide. I can walk you through this application and even perform tasks for you. Shall we begin?
steps.2: This is your main dashboard. The rings at the top show the compliance status of each policy at a glance. A full green ring is 100% compliant.
steps.3: Down here is a detailed list of all policy documents. Let's take a closer look at the 'Performance Management' policy. Shall I open it for you?
steps.4: Great, here is the full policy document.
steps.5: On the right, you can see the lifecycle actions. Since this document is a 'Draft', you can submit it for approval. Would you like me to do that for you now?
steps.6: Excellent. I've submitted it. Notice the audit trail has been updated. Let's go to the Risk Assessment Matrix next.
steps.7: This is the Risk Assessment Matrix. It's pre-populated with potential risks and now includes a management approval workflow. You can add new risks manually or use our new AI-Guided assessment.
steps.8: The final key area is the Live Assistant, where you can speak in real-time with an AI consultant about compliance. We won't start a session now, but you can explore it later.
steps.9: That concludes our guided tour! You can restart this tour anytime from the header. Enjoy using the application!
